summary: Comprehensive testing of OFF application completed successfully. All backend APIs (14/14) and frontend features working perfectly. AI integrations (GPT-5, Claude-4, Gemini 2.5 Pro) fully functional. Child creation, challenge generation, family management, and leaderboard all operational.

resolved_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error in response
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added proper data cleaning to avoid ObjectId serialization issues

resolved_issues.issue: DateTime comparison error between timezone-aware and timezone-naive objects
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added timezone normalization for datetime comparisons

passed_tests: Challenge completion and Fun credits system
action_item_for_E1: No action items required. Application is fully functional and ready for production. All features working as expected including AI integrations.
